DEATHKNIGHT_UNHOLY:
Use Power Infusion on the Unholy Death Knight when:

  • Their Gargoyle is active and will expire within 22 seconds, or they are not using Gargoyle but have Army of the Dead active with minions (Abomination or Army Ghouls) lasting under 18 seconds.
  • They have Dark Transformation active and are not using Gargoyle or Army of the Dead in their build.
  • Facing 3 or more enemies with either Dark Transformation active or Death and Decay affecting the area.
DEMONHUNTER_HAVOC:
Use Power Infusion on the Havoc Demon Hunter when:

  • They activate Metamorphosis, as this is their primary damage window.
  • The fight duration is under 20 seconds remaining to maximize burst before combat ends.
DRUID_BALANCE:
Answer

Use Power Infusion on the Balance Druid when:

  • They activate Celestial Alignment or Incarnation: Chosen of Elune to amplify their major cooldown window.
  • They are in a high-damage phase requiring burst output, such as during Starfall or Starsurge spam.
  • Their rotation aligns with raid-wide buffs (e.g., Bloodlust or Power Infusion stacking) for maximum multiplicative scaling.
DRUID_FERAL:
Use Power Infusion on the Feral Druid when:

  • They activate Incarnation: Avatar of Ashamane (while bs_inc buff is active).
  • They are not using the Berserk: Heart of the Lion talent.
EVOKER_DEVASTATION:
Use Power Infusion on the Devastation Evoker when:

  • Dragonrage is active and Shattering Star is on cooldown
  • Dragonrage is active and the target has the Shattering Star debuff
  • Dragonrage is active and there are 2 or more enemies
  • The encounter will end within 35 seconds
HUNTER_MARKSMANSHIP:
Use Power Infusion on the Marksmanship Hunter when:

  • The Hunter's Trueshot is active with more than 12 seconds remaining.
  • The encounter will end in less than 13 seconds.
HUNTER_SURVIVAL:
Use Power Infusion on the Survival Hunter when:

  • The Hunter has Coordinated Assault active.
  • The Hunter does not have Coordinated Assault talented and has used Spearhead (during its cooldown).
  • The Hunter is not using Coordinated Assault or Spearhead at all.
MAGE_ARCANE:
Use Power Infusion on the Frost Death Knight when:

  • The target has Spymaster's Web equipped and is channeling Evocation.
MAGE_FIRE:
Use Power Infusion on the Fire Mage when:

  • Their Combustion is about to be used (within the pre-cast window).
  • They are already in Combustion with more than 7 seconds remaining.
  • The fight will end in less than 20 seconds.
MAGE_FROST:
Use Power Infusion on the Frost Death Knight when:

  • The target does not have Power Infusion currently active.
MONK_WINDWALKER:
Use Power Infusion on the Windwalker Monk when:

  • Xuen the White Tiger is active.
  • Either Bloodlust is not active, or Strike of the Windlord is available during Bloodlust.
PALADIN_RETRIBUTION:
Use Power Infusion on the Retribution Paladin when:

  • The Paladin has Avenging Wrath active.
  • The Paladin has Crusade active.
  • The target is affected by the Execution Sentence debuff.
PRIEST_SHADOW:
Use Power Infusion on the Shadow Priest when:

  • The target is in Voidform and Power Infusion is not active.
  • Dark Ascension is active and Power Infusion is not active.
  • The TWW 2pc/4pc set bonus is active and Power Infusion is not active.
ROGUE_ASSASSINATION:
Use Power Infusion on the Assassination Rogue when:

  • Their Deathmark damage-over-time effect is active, as this amplifies their burst window during this major cooldown.
ROGUE_SUBTLETY:
Use Power Infusion on the Subtlety Rogue when:

  • the Rogue has Shadow Dance active, as this is their primary damage window for high-impact abilities like Shadowstrike.
SHAMAN_ELEMENTAL:
Use Power Infusion on the Frost Death Knight when:

  • The Ascendance buff is active on the Elemental Shaman.
  • The Elemental Shaman's Ascendance cooldown has more than 30 seconds remaining.
SHAMAN_ENHANCEMENT:
Use Power Infusion on the Enhancement Shaman when:

  • They activate Ascendance, granting increased attack speed and spell casting speed.
  • They summon Feral Spirits, enhancing their melee attacks.
  • They trigger Doom Winds, empowering their Windfury weapon.
  • The fight’s final 20 seconds, to maximize execute-phase damage.
  • Their core offensive cooldowns have over 2 minutes remaining before they can be used again.
  • They do not have Ascendance, Feral Spirit, or Doom Winds talented.
WARLOCK_AFFLICTION:
Use Power Infusion on the Affliction Warlock when:

  • The Warlock is actively using their major offensive cooldowns to maximize damage output.
WARLOCK_DEMONOLOGY:
Use Power Infusion on the Demonology Warlock when:

  • They are preparing to summon Demonic Tyrant and have recently cast Hand of Gul'dan or Ruination.
  • Their summoned imps are about to expire within 2 global cooldowns of the Demonic Tyrant cast time.
  • They have fewer than 2 Soul Shards remaining during the Demonic Tyrant setup phase.
WARLOCK_DESTRUCTION:
Use Power Infusion on the Destruction Warlock when:

  • Their Summon Infernal is active, to amplify its burst window.
  • They aren’t using the Summon Infernal talent, enabling frequent use of Power Infusion on cooldown.
  • The boss will die before another usable Summon Infernal window (with time to benefit from Power Infusion).
  • The remaining combat time is shorter than Summon Infernal's cooldown recovery +15 seconds, forcing its immediate use.
WARRIOR_ARMS:
Use Power Infusion on the Arms Warrior when:

  • The target is affected by Colossus Smash and the encounter duration allows at least 135 seconds remaining.
  • The Warrior is in the Execute phase (target below 20% health) with Avatar active.
  • The fight will end within 25 seconds regardless of other conditions.
WARRIOR_FURY:
Use Power Infusion on the Fury Warrior when:

  • Avatar has more than 15 seconds remaining and the encounter will last at least 135 additional seconds.
  • The target is in Execute Phase (below 20% health) and Avatar is active.
  • The encounter will end within 25 seconds.
